Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with clindamycin
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels for antimicrobial susceptibility testing with addition of clindamycin.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci, including clindamycin susceptibility testing for Staphylococcus spp.
